description: Direct message the job poster from 24 Seven Talent
responsibilities:
• Track all production orders with primarily overseas factories
• Coordinate daily communication of production status to all internal departments, technical directives, and delivery schedules
• Coordinate production plans and strategic logistic plans • Request and manage photoshoot sample needs
• Oversee and track all bulk approvals of materials
• Closely collaborate with Design and Sales Teams to understand product from start to finish
• Additional responsibilities as required

qualifications.required:
• Minimum 2 years of practical work experience in production, preferably in the contemporary apparel space
• Knowledge in production process, data management platforms, and apparel production/ERP systems.
qualifications.preferred:
• Proficiency Microsoft Office Suite, and advanced Excel skill level
• Ability to efficiently prioritize a demanding workload in a fast-paced environment
• Extremely strong attention to detail, organization, and commitment to ensuring overall accuracy
• Effective written and oral communication skills • Ability to successfully work both independently and as part of a team
